plays.text: Penalty to Jiri Slegr 2 minutes for Holding Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Slashing Martin Erat
Goal scored by Kimmo Timonen assisted by Andy Delmore and Martin Erat
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Tripping Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Steve Dubinsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Steve Dubinsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Dubinsky
Penalty to Karlis Skrastins 2 minutes for Holding Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Holding Kimmo Timonen
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Tripping David Legwand
Goal scored by Andy Delmore assisted by Kimmo Timonen
Penalty to Kimmo Timonen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Jere Karalahti 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to David Legwand 2 minutes for Slashing Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Greg Johnson 2 minutes for Elbowing Luc Robitaille
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Luc Robitaille
Goal scored by Scott Hartnell assisted by David Legwand and Petr Tenkrat
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Interference Petr Tenkrat
Penalty to Jere Karalahti 2 minutes for Interference Sean Avery
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Steve Duchesne and Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Brett Hull
